General.Name: Guangzheng Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzheng Eye Hospital Group Co., Ltd. provides various ophthalmic medical services in China. It operates through Steel Structure, Energy, and Medical and Health Sector segments. The company offers diagnosis and treatment of various eye diseases; medical optometry services; invests in, operates, and manages eye hospitals; and provides related services. In addition, it researches ophthalmic medical technology; sells and transports natural gas; and builds steel structure. Further, the company engages in leasing of houses; and property and consulting services. Guangzheng Eye Hospital Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Xinjiang, China.
